PdpContextManagerControl Class Reference
[APOXI Stack Control]

#include <Apoxi/Asc/PdpContextManagerControl.hpp>


Public Member Functions

 PdpContextManagerControl ()
virtual ~PdpContextManagerControl ()
Unsolicited asynchronous indications
These callbacks are asynchronously called either by the network or by another process (ATC) to indicate certain events.

virtual void OnActivateContextIndication (PdpContext::Type type, PdpContext::Address address)
virtual void OnAttachRep (BOOLEAN attached)
virtual void OnAttachStatusIndication ()
virtual void OnDetachIndication (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause, PdpContext::Origin origin=PdpContext::UnknownOrigin)
Requested asynchronous responses
These callbacks are asynchronously called as responses to previously put requests.

virtual void OnAttachCompleted (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause)
virtual void OnDetachCompleted (PdpContext::ErrorCause cause)

Detailed Description

This class contains the callback routines called upon arrival of signals dedicated to the PDP context manager.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual PdpContextManagerControl::~PdpContextManagerControl (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

Member Function Documentation

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnActivateContextIndication (  PdpContext::Type  type,
PdpContext::Address  address
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack indication of an unsolicited context activation event coming up from the net. Response must be performed by using any new PdpContext, and it's Accept()-method, or by rejecting the request using PdpContext's static method Reject().

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnAttachCompleted (  PdpContext::ErrorCause  cause  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack response of previously submitted PdpContextManager::Attach().

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnAttachRep (  BOOLEAN  attached  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack report of an unsolicited attach event.

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnAttachStatusIndication (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack report of an unsolicited attach status event.

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnDetachCompleted (  PdpContext::ErrorCause  cause  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack response of previously submitted PdpContextManager::Detach().

virtual void PdpContextManagerControl::OnDetachIndication (  PdpContext::ErrorCause  cause,
PdpContext::Origin  origin = PdpContext::UnknownOrigin
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the stack indication of an unsolicited detach event.
